name: Autonomous System Number
title: ASN
definition: Indicates the unique number identifying the customer Internet network ordering the Border Gateway Protocol (BGP) service.
validEntryNotes: An entry in this field must comply with the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF)standards for an ASN. The ASN is provided by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA).
usageNotes: Required when ordering BGP, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: An ASN is assigned to each network on the Internet.
